name: UnterStrom
description:
In a world were energy is the only currency your only way to survive is to never let the battery of your mech hit zero percent. Explore the map and unlock new missions, set new high scores in the arena mode and beat the final boss to unlock the champion mode with challenges specific for the best mech pilots out there.

Controls Move:
  • Keyboard:     A/D
  • Gamepad:     Leftstick
Jump:
  • Keyboard:     Space
  • Gamepad:     Southbutton
Dash:
  • Keyboard:     Rightclick
  • Gamepad:     Lefttrigger
Shooting:
  • Keyboard:     Leftclick
  • Gamepad:     Righttrigger
